author: _shemnon
content:
Here's updated tstore tests - https://github.com/shemnon/ethereum-tests/pull/4

I'd push it to ethereum/tests but I know how dmitry is about tests created from uncommitted artifacts (lllc on mac needs tweaks, retesteth had a couple of tweaks, besu is running off of an experimental graalvm fork)

author: _shemnon
content: One notable tweak- tests 16 and 17 need a constant adjusted or a tstore field adjusted.  Newer versions of YUL generate PUSH0, so the `extraOpcodesGas` either needs to go down by one or we need to tstore into not-zero.

author: _shemnon
content: Everything elses is vanilla, except for the info blocks.

author: _shemnon
content: I also changed the network to Cancun, and you will see other gas deltas because of PUSH0
